Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Standard of review applied by RAD to credibility findings
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal from RPD decision to RAD, followed by judicial review
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: RPD and RAD found applicant not credible
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee protection appeal and judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to justify use of reasonableness standard
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Matter referred back to RAD for reconsideration
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness vs. correctness in administrative review
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Appropriate standard of review for credibility findings
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Requirement for proper legal reasoning by RAD
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to standard of review applied by RAD

Crimes.Crime_Name: Use of False Documents for Immigration Purpose
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Proper application of reasonableness standard to credibility assessment involving false documents
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Refugee claim with credibility issues due to false documents
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Credibility rejected due to use of false documents
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Use of false documents affecting credibility
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee protection appeal and judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Overly deferential reasonableness review despite document fraud
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Matter referred back to RAD for reconsideration
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of false documents in support of claim
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RAD gave undue deference despite fraud
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remitted to RAD for reassessment with proper legal guidance
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Use of false documents leading to credibility rejection
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Reliance on forged or falsified documents
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Need for independent reassessment by RAD
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that RAD failed to properly assess credibility
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to reassess credibility de novo where fraud suspected
